comment: The app is no doubt brilliant, the best for Kodi even, however it does have one glaring failure. It can't make my breakfast. @ the dev, you need to enable this feature as a matter of priority, until then I can only give you 5 stars. Very poor effort.

author: מוטי מזרחי
comment: I really like the option to choose a TV channel directly from the remote.also allows to adjust subtitles  (if used) with really easily. Awesome app

author: Luke Cross
comment: Amazing app. Use it to control my kodi box connected to the tv and for indexing. Developers always working with the community to provide improvements and updates.

author: Paul Crosby
comment: Still learning all it's tricks but so far a great way to control the OSMC on the Raspberry Pi 3

author: Greg Johnson
comment: I bought it, quit with the donate/rate screen already.

author: Gareth Williams
comment: This is better than the "official" Kodi app.

author: Ali Hammouz
comment: Greater remote for your kodi machine

author: Tom Stembridge
comment: By far the best remote I have used for Kodi, there is integration with Plex amongst others, however these are not implemented as well. If you want a remote for Kodi, there is none better.

author: Robin Roy
comment: Stop asking me to rate and donate after every update when I've already rated and bought your app. This is completely unnecessary and annoying!

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
This is an header in the changelog that will be always be displayed as it reduce support by 75% and increase contact rate by 40%.
I'm sorry that i work too much for you and provide monthly updates for 7 years.
I suppose I'll now stop working on the app and build a new one to force users to pay since the more I care for user the more they complain.

author: Jacques Brouwers
comment: Best Kodi remote control I have tried

author: Anthony Selby
comment: New look is great

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
Hi,

Please as written everywhere contact me for support as I can"t do anythung from Play Store comments. No information no way to contact you back and 90% chance you never get this message.

Regards,
Tolriq

author: Sean Stonerock
comment: Awesome application

author: Jessie Buck
comment: Trash

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
Thanks you for explaining us your life, but this is not Facebook here you know :)

So if you are talking about Yatse why not activate your brain and write anything useful about your issues, so that others users know what is your issue or the support could help.

Of course unless you are a fake comment :)

Regards,
Tolriq

author: Andy Taylor
comment: Excellent remote navigation for Kodi.  I use it from a tablet to queue up lossless albums on a Kodi media player.  Provides excellent indexing, but also great directory navigation and whole album playback.  Great for other media too, but for me it's the pinnacle for navigating a large collection for hifi playback.  Great support and regular improvements.  If there's a better way, I've not found it.

author: The Master
comment: Reinstalled it and it works ok but does not all you to move it to the sd card it's rom locked only. I did see that you have to buy the unlocker to save the sd so I understand that , do you also have to pay to move the app to the sd card? Please allow app to be moved to sd card.

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
Please learn to read.
As I said I can't allow that, it's Google that block it because Yatse have widgets... There's app to force that if rooted.
And yes the cache folder is mainly for downloaded files that is paid.
Sorry to provide you monthly updates since 7 years without ads and you prefer bad rating than paying for my work ....

Regards,
Tolriq

author: Elliot Seeds
comment: Brilliant, keeps getting better after ~5 years of flawless use. This is the Kodi remote to use!
Great app, I'm using it on daily basis with my OSMC (Kodi). Working like a charm, no issues so far.

author: r00 tz01
comment: Exelente app,el mejor se todos los remotes para kodi

author: Alexander Jordan Al Alawin
comment: Everything working as it should

author: Paris Lastrange
comment: Love it better than kore

author: Avi BM
comment: Best app for kodi by far

author: Sonny Asus
comment: Awesome app

author: A Google User
comment: I've been using this app since it's been available on the app store. At that time there was an official app or a third party app that was "official", I can't remember which. Since then, YATSE has been the best remote app for XBMC/KODI and nothing comes close. Buy it with confidence that you will have the best app for controlling all your KODI boxes.

Fine App, that does what was promised. Gone "pro" for less than two months, and have already had three popups, asking me to donate more. At that price, a single "thank you" would have been more suitable;-)

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content: Thanks for the bad rating but you may read a little more about those msg. Because they are not popups this is the changelog, that shows that you had 3 major updates. I'm sorry that I work so hard on the app you paid. I should probably drop it now that I have your money and made another app. Monthly updates since 7 years is what the donation's for.

author: Christer Johansson
comment: So nice app but why it become slower after purchase, boys and girls support developer he really do anything to help 10 stars is he worth and a super product

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
It does not become slower after purchase it seems some users have speed issues on some device since version 8.1.6.

It would be perfect if you could contact support with logs and details https://yatse.tv/Debug so we can find the root cause.

Regards,
Tolriq

author: Richard Webster
comment: This app works perfectly with openelec/kodi on my raspberry pi. Remote control, local play, stream to other devices. Amazing app.
I've been trying for weeks, and I just can't get it to connect. It recognizes Kodi on my computer, but can't go any further.

reply.author: Tolriq
reply.content:
And at no point you saw all the messages explaining how to get instant support?
Thanks for the bad rating for not being able to configure Kodi correctly but this is not really related to Yatse even if support could have helped you with that.
It's either your firewall or you are using a fire stick and both cases are explained in the FAQ ....

author: Matthew Schroeder
comment: The best app for managing kodi media boxes.  Period.  Worth every cent of the purchase price.

author: Matthew Blissett
comment: Long initialization, but remains as the best kodi control app.

If you get this why not contact support with details ? :)

author: Robert McGregor
comment: Great app. As well as the Kodi remote love the casting functionality. Allows me to cast to tv from IPTV app on my phone which other casting apps cant seem to handle. Don't even need Kodi to cast to Chromecast.

author: John Morgan
comment: Very good app controls all my kodi box's without any dramas!! Also great plugins for AV receivers

author: Marvin Blessing
comment: Great app, works very well as kodi remote!
